about.title: About me. . .
about.me: I am a graduate in Computer Science, with more than 3 years of professional experience and a master's degree in Informatics Engineering. Through my career and personal projects, I have work on several technologies and took up challenges throughout a project's lifecycle.
about.years: Over the next five years I would like to grow into a well-rounded developer, with a strong technical foundation and experience in a variety of fun projects. I would also like to get my hands on new technologies and approaches for improving user experience.
about.interview: From our discussion, I appreaciated the approach and technologies presented, as well as the team's overall feeling. I also liked the appreciation the team has for creative solutions and design.
